sentences.en: Diligence , thrift , plain living and hard work constitute the good proletarian style.
sentences.cn: 勤俭节约 、 艰苦奋斗是无产阶级的优良作风.

sentences.en: Diligence. thriftplainand hard work constitute the good proletarian style.
sentences.cn: 勤俭节约. 艰苦奋斗是无产阶级的优良作风.

sentences.en: Dr. Norman Bethune impersonates the spirit of proletarian internationalism.
sentences.cn: 白求恩医生体现了无产阶级国际主义精神.

sentences.en: He is the father of proletarian literature.
sentences.cn: 他是无产阶级文学的奠基人.

sentences.en: In essence what was involved was proletarian leadership in the united front.
sentences.cn: 这在本质上就是统一战线中无产阶级领导权的问题.

sentences.en: Lo Lung - chi asked, how could little proletarian intellectuals lead big petty - bourgeois intellectuals?
sentences.cn: 罗隆基说, 无产阶级的小知识分子怎么能领导小资产阶级的大知识分子?

sentences.en: Proletarian politics demands that all these be done.
sentences.cn: 这些要求本身就是无产阶级政治的要求.

sentences.en: Such study and description are proper if done from a proletarian position.
sentences.cn: 这种研究和描写如果是站在无产阶级立场上的,那是应该的.

sentences.en: The menu, prepared by White House chef Jon Hill , was anything but proletarian.
sentences.cn: 白宫厨师乔恩·布尔准备的佳肴无所不有.

sentences.en: The proletarian patriotism is combined with internationalism.
sentences.cn: 无产阶级的爱国主义是同国际主义相结合的.

sentences.en: The serf an assured existence, the proletarian has not.
sentences.cn: 农奴生活有保障, 无产者生活无保障.

sentences.en: They praised him as a proletarian internationalist fighter of the Bethune type.
sentences.cn: 他们称赞他是白求恩式的无产阶级国际主义战士.

sentences.en: They remained true to the banner of proletarian internationalism.
sentences.cn: 他们一直忠于无产阶级国际主义的旗帜.

sentences.en: To do so would be running counter to proletarian internationalism.
sentences.cn: 这样做,就会违反无产阶级国际主义.

words.tran_cn: 无产阶级，工人阶级；最下层阶级

trans.tran_cn: 无产阶级的， （大工业的）工人阶级的
trans.tran_en: Proletarian means relating to the proletariat
